Although the alleyways of northern Elis are populated and thus safe to traverse during daylight hours, they're completely deserted at night, granting the opportunity for muggers and other such lowlifes to assault innocent travellers. As you're [pc.walking] down a particularly narrow and gloomy passageway in this dangerous part of the town, you suddenly catch sight of someone attempting to conceal themselves in a recessed doorway up ahead. Realising that they must be up to no good, you stop in your tracks and prepare for the worst.

#IF(npc.isMute()) Realising that they've been spotted, this character silently [npc.steps] out of their hiding place, allowing you to see that they're [npc.a_fullRace(true)]. Making an aggressive move towards you, [npc.she] sneers, [npc.speech(I'll be taking your valuables now. Hand them over!)] #ENDIF

With just moments to spare before [npc.sheIs] upon you, the choice of whether to defend yourself or pay up must be quickly made... #ENDIF
